page.title: 06A typical day in my life
page.content: I am Christopher Cooper,a pupil at Gurnos Junior School,Lower Cwmtwrch.There are 66 children and 3 teachers in our school. My day starts at 7 a.m when mother calls me.School uniform is a white shirt,grey trousers,burgundy pullover and grey and burgundy school tie. School starts with assembly every morning then English or Maths until break at 10.40 a.m.We have a tuck-shop at school to buy crisps or biscuits.More work until 12.15 p.m.If it is a subject I like the time goes quickly.
